pages.text: Mythos is a magical mana energy. Mythos can be used in place of durability of tools, along with many other magical deeds.
As of 0.8.0b, the only ways to create Mythos in survival are by creating Crystallized Brick blocks. Each one creates 25 Mythos.
You may store up to 4,000 Mythos by default on your character. However, you may infuse items with Mythos, allow you to store it, or it'll the make item usable.
